com.hp.mss.hpprint.view

Class PagePreviewView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.hp.mss.hpprint.view.PagePreviewView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class PagePreviewView
extends android.view.View
    This is used inside the PrintPreview Activity. You do not need to create this by yourself.
